content: In 2020, which Korean film made history by winning Best Picture at the Academy Awards, becoming the first non-English language film to do so?

I believe the film you're referring to is "Parasite." It's a South Korean black comedy thriller film directed by Bong Joon-ho. "Parasite" made history at the 92nd Academy Awards in 2020 by winning four Oscars: Best Picture, Best Director for Bong Joon-ho, Best Original Screenplay, and Best International Feature Film. This was indeed a groundbreaking achievement, as it was the first non-English language film to win the Best Picture award.
